CREAZIONE TOPIC
docker-compose exec broker  \
  kafka-topics --create --topic test --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1 --if-not-exists --zookeeper zookeeper:2181


VERIFICA TOPIC
docker-compose exec broker  \
  kafka-topics --describe --topic test --zookeeper zookeeper:2181


PRODUCER TEST
docker-compose exec broker  \
  bash -c "seq 42 | kafka-console-producer --request-required-acks 1 --broker-list broker:9092 --topic test && echo 'Produced 42 messages.'"


CONSUMER TEST
docker-compose exec broker  \
  kafka-console-consumer --bootstrap-server broker:9092 --topic test --from-beginning --max-messages 42


SCHEMA REGISTRY CONTAINER
docker run -it --net=desktop_default --rm confluentinc/cp-schema-registry:5.2.1 bash


AVRO CONSOLE
kafka-avro-console-producer \
  --broker-list broker:9092 --topic test \
  --property value.schema='{"type":"record","name":"myrecord","fields":[{"name":"f1","type":"string"}]}'

{"f1": "value1"}
{"f1": "value2"}
{"f1": "value3"}


CONNECT TOPICS

kafka-topics --create --topic quickstart-config --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1 --if-not-exists --zookeeper zookeeper:2181

kafka-topics --create --topic quickstart-data --partitions 1 --replication-factor 1 --if-not-exists --zookeeper zookeeper:2181
